To test the offline build workflow, first clear the pkgdown external
frontend dependencies cache that might exist on your machine:

```r
pkgdown.offline::clear_cache()
```

Create a new package:

```r
usethis::create_package("xyz")
```

**Turn off internet connection**. In the new project, run:

```r
usethis::use_pkgdown()
pkgdown.offline::build_site()
```
